By Malicka Danna Sielinou

LONDON, Dec 6 (IFR) - * Allocs out:  final books GBP1.65bn+, at reoffer. No hedges. (2:20pm)

* Final terms: GBP210m at 5.25% (s/a coupon). Books GBP1.75bn+ pre-rec, now closed. (11:36am) 

* Guidance: 5.5% area (s/a coupon). Size set at GBP210m. Books GBP1.2bn+, subject at 11.30am. JPM is B&D. (11:06am) 

* IPTs: 6.000% area (coupon). Denoms 200k+1k. Listing London. English and Scots law. Pricing today. (9:10am)

abrdn plc (Ticker: ABDNLN) has mandated Barclays, BofA Securities, HSBC and J.P. Morgan Cazenove as Joint Lead Managers, to organise a series of fixed income investor calls commencing on Thursday 2 December. A GBP200m (expected) Perp NC 5.5 Fixed Rate Reset Perpetual Subordinated Additional Tier 1 Contingent Convertible transaction will follow, subject to market conditions. The notes will feature principal loss absorption in the form of contingent equity conversion, are expected to be rated Baa2 / BBB- by Moody’s / S&P, and will be in Reg S Registered format. FCA / ICMA stabilisation applies. NetRoadshow: www.netroadshow.com/nrs/home/#!/?show=38430b90 (Recommended) OR Visit www.netroadshow.com and entry code: Stock77 (not case-sensitive). UK MiFIR – Professionals / ECPs-only / No PRIIPs or UK PRIIPs KID / UK FCA CoCo restriction. (Dec 2)

(Malicka Sielinou)
